description.jp:
いつも笑顔の０組のポジティブ男子。
のんびりした口調で 深刻な時も冗談を
言うなど 一見 緊張感に欠ける。
軽薄に見えるものの あえて場を
なごませる役割を担っているふしがあり
そのストイックな本性は 一撃必殺の
刀を振るう独特のスタイルに表れている。
description.gl: An upbeat cadet from Class Zero who always has a smile on his face. His leisurely tone and jokes are able to dispel tension in even the most dire situations. Though he appears frivolous on the surface、 he deliberately tries to lighten the mood and has a stoic side that is reflected in his unique swordsmanship—sundering foes in a single strike.

jp.text: ひゃ〜 強いねあの人
前向きになれば\n前向きな未来が描けるんだよぉ
さすが委員長！\nきっちりさんだね〜
僕は\n今が続く方がいいと思うんだよねぇ〜
やだなぁ〜 \n仲間はずれにしないでよぉ〜

gl.text: Whew! This guy is pretty tough.
If we stay positive、 we can picture a brighter future!
That's our class leader: always micromanaging!
So I think we should just stay in the moment、 y'know what I mean?
Aw、 come on、 guys! Don't leave me out! Please?

name.gl: コールアビリティ_ジャック
name.jp: コールアビリティ_ジャック

rank_up_desc.en: When using [Ninja Slice (C)]\n• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV\n• Increases critical BRV damage dealt by 50%
rank_up_desc.gl: When using Ninja Slice (C):\n • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%\n • Moderately increased BRV damage with critical hits
rank_up_desc.jp:
「一の太刀【C】」使用時
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分
・クリティカル時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ

name.gl: LDコールアビリティ_ジャック
name.jp: LDコールアビリティ_ジャック

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Piercing Gleam (C)]
• Becomes
　∟ 3-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack
　∟ Increases own BRV by 20% HP damage dealt
　∟ 5-HIT melee BRV + HP attack
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• [Blade Wound] duration +2
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Piercing Gleam (C):
 • 8-hit melee BRV  attack + HP  attack becomes 3-hit melee BRV  attack + HP  attack + Increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt + 5-hit melee BRV  attack + HP  attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Katana Wounds duration +2
rank_up_desc.jp:
「一閃突破【C】」使用時
・8HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃が
　3HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　＋与えたHPダメージの20％分 自身のBRVをアップさせる
　＋5HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃に変化
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・「刀傷」の2ACTION期間延長

desc.en: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 近距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en:
3-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack
Deals critical BRV damage when attacking enemy not targeting self
Self: 3 turns [Every Ounce of Strength]

When breaking target or attacking a broken target
• Triggers [Deliverance]
　∟ Increases own BRV by 100% of Attack
　∟ 4-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (30% per hit)
　∟ Moves next turn to before target if turn would otherwise come after (except during summon)
desc.gl:
3-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
Becomes critical hit when attacking enemy not targeting self
Self: 3 turns Every Ounce of Strength

Triggers Deliverance (increases BRV based on ATK; 4-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack; moves next turn to before target if turn would otherwise come after [except during summoning]) when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
While equipping EX+ weapon Dragonslayer (T0)+ with max limit breaks or passive ability Flash of Blood Extension:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 6; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
desc.jp:
3HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
自身を狙っていないターゲット攻撃時 クリティカルになる
自身に3ACTION「渾身の力」付与
ターゲットブレイク時 ブレイク中攻撃時
以下の「引導渡し」が追加発動
自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
＋4HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
次回行動順がターゲットより後ろの場合
ターゲットの直前に移動（召喚中は除く）
最大まで限界突破したEX+武器「竜殺し【零式】+」または
パッシブ「鮮血一閃エクステンド」装備時
BRV攻撃のHIT数が6HITに変化し 合計BRV威力も中アップ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

Target: Inflicts BREAK　
8-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack
Increases critical BRV damage dealt by 50%
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV

Increases own BRV by 20% HP damage dealt to target

When breaking target or attacking a broken target
• Triggers follow-up attack (identical to upgraded [Deliverance])
　∟ Increases own BRV by 100% of Attack
　∟ 6-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (30% per hit)
　∟ Moves next turn to before target if turn would otherwise come after (except during summon)

Afflicted targets' [Blade Wound] level +1 upon taking damage from BRV or HP attacks (once per turn, excl. some abilities)

8-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage with critical hits
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

Increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt to selected target
All enemies: 3 turns 1 level Katana Wounds (limit 5)

 • Increases BRV based on ATK
 • 6-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Moves next turn to before target if turn would otherwise come after (except during summoning)

Katana Wounds increased 1 level when afflicted target hit with any BRV attack, HP attack (once per action; some attacks excluded)

name.jp: 第1ジャック用内部バフ

desc.jp: 第1ジャック用内部バフ

desc.en:
When called for assistance, Jack performs the following actions
• Self: 6 turns [Every Ounce of Strength] 
• 6-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack
• Deals critical BRV damage when attacking enemy not targeting caller

When breaking target or attacking a broken target
• Triggers [Deliverance]
　∟ Increases own BRV by 100% of Attack
　∟ 4-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (30% per hit)
　∟ Moves next turn to before target if turn would otherwise come after (except during summon)
* Upgraded when [Flash of Blood Extend] passive is equipped
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 6
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 60%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
Jack's ability when called:
 • Self: Grants Every Ounce of Strength
 • 6-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • Becomes critical hit when attacking enemy not targeting calling character

When inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break, Deliverance triggers the following additional actions:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK
 • 4-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • Moves next turn to before target if turn would otherwise come after (except during summoning)

While equipping EX+ weapon Dragonslayer (T0)+ with max limit breaks or passive ability Flash of Blood Extension:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 6; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
desc.jp:
コールされたジャックが以下の行動を行う
自身に「渾身の力」付与し
6HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
コールしたキャラクターを狙っていないターゲット攻撃時
クリティカルになる
ターゲットブレイク時 ブレイク中攻撃時
以下の「引導渡し」が追加発動
自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
＋4HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
次回行動順がターゲットより後ろの場合
ターゲットの直前に移動（召喚中は除く）
最大まで限界突破したEX+武器「竜殺し【零式】+」または
パッシブ「鮮血一閃エクステンド」装備時
BRV攻撃のHIT数が6HITに変化し 合計BRV威力も中アップ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

name.jp: 第1ジャック用内部バフ

desc.jp: 第1ジャック用内部バフ

desc.en:
When called for assistance, Jack performs the following actions
• Target: Inflicts BREAK
• 8-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (120x8)
• Increases critical BRV damage dealt by 50%
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
• Increases caller's BRV by 20% HP damage dealt to target
• All targets: 2 turns 1 level of [Blade Wound] (limit 5); afflicted [Blade Wound] level +2

When breaking target or attacking a broken target
• Triggers follow-up attack (identical to upgraded [Deliverance])
　∟ Increases own BRV by 100% of Attack
　∟ 6-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (30% per hit)
　∟ Moves next turn to before target if turn would otherwise come after (except during summon)

Afflicted targets' [Blade Wound] level +1 upon taking damage from BRV or HP attacks (once per turn, excl. some abilities)
desc.gl:
Jack's ability when called:
 • Inflicts Break on selected target
 • 8-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • Moderately increased BRV damage with critical hits
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • Increases BRV of character who called Jack by 20% of HP damage dealt
 • All enemies: 2 turns 1 level Katana Wounds (limit 5)

When inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK
 • 6-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Moves next turn to before target if turn would otherwise come after (except during summoning)

Katana Wounds increased 1 level when afflicted target hit with any BRV attack, HP attack (once per action; some attacks excluded)
Increases Katana Wounds 2 levels on all afflicted enemies when attacking afflicted target with this ability
desc.jp:
コールされたジャックが以下の行動を行う
ターゲットをブレイクし 8HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
クリティカル時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
ターゲットに与えたHPダメージの20％分
ジャックをコールしたキャラクターのBRVをアップさせる
敵全体に2ACTION「刀傷」1段階付与（上限5）
ターゲットブレイク時 ブレイク中攻撃時 以下の行動が追加発動
自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
＋6HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する 上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
次回行動順がターゲットより後ろの場合 ターゲットの直前に移動（召喚中は除く）
「刀傷」は付与された対象が
BRV攻撃またはHP攻撃を受けた時も1段階アップ
（一部攻撃を除く 段階アップは1回の行動で1回のみ）
「刀傷」の弱体効果が付与された敵攻撃時 このアビリティでは2段階付与になる
